Package org.uob.a2.gameobjects

Class Room

java.lang.Object
org.uob.a2.gameobjects.GameObject
org.uob.a2.gameobjects.Room
public class Room extends GameObject
Represents a room in the game, which is a type of GameObject.

Rooms can have items, equipment, features, and exits. They also manage navigation and interactions within the game world.
